Back to Sergei Rachmaninoff

Sergei Rachmaninoff

Scherzo from A Midsummer Night’s Dream (Felix Mendelssohn)

1933 · Threlfall and Norris III/7

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of the scherzo from Felix Mendelssohn’s incidental music to A Midsummer Night’s Dream (op. 61).

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 5
